import zipfile

from zipfile import ZipFile

# ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã•ã‚ŒãŸ zip ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‹ã‚‰ enum ã‚’å«ã‚€ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ï¼ˆKafkaé–¢é€£ï¼‰ã‚’æŠ½å‡º
kafka_enum_files = []
kafka_enum_keywords = ["AutoOffsetReset", "IsolationLevel", "SecurityProtocol", "ValidationMode"]

with ZipFile("/mnt/data/Abstractions.zip", "r") as zip_ref:
    for file in zip_ref.namelist():
        if "Configuration" in file and file.endswith(".cs"):
            if any(keyword in file for keyword in kafka_enum_keywords):
                kafka_enum_files.append(file)

kafka_enum_files.sort()
kafka_enum_files

## âœ… PowerShell ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆï¼š`.mhtml` â†’ `.md` å¤‰æ›

```powershell
# PowerShell Script: Convert-MhtmlToMarkdown.ps1

param (
    [Parameter(Mandatory = $true)]
    [string]$InputMhtmlPath,

    [string]$OutputMarkdownPath = "$($InputMhtmlPath).md"
)

# èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿
$mhtmlContent = Get-Content -Path $InputMhtmlPath -Raw -Encoding UTF8

# text/html éƒ¨åˆ†ã®æŠ½å‡ºï¼ˆ1ã¤ç›®ã‚’å¯¾è±¡ï¼‰
$body = ''
if ($mhtmlContent -match 'Content-Type:\s*text/html.*?charset=.*?\r?\n\r?\n(.*?)--', 'Singleline') {
    $body = $matches[1]
}

# HTML â†’ Markdown ã®ç°¡æ˜“å¤‰æ›é–¢æ•°
function Convert-HtmlToMarkdown {
    param([string]$html)

    $html = $html -replace '<h1[^>]*>(.*?)<\/h1>', '# $1'
    $html = $html -replace '<h2[^>]*>(.*?)<\/h2>', '## $1'
    $html = $html -replace '<h3[^>]*>(.*?)<\/h3>', '### $1'
    $html = $html -replace '<b[^>]*>(.*?)<\/b>', '**$1**'
    $html = $html -replace '<strong[^>]*>(.*?)<\/strong>', '**$1**'
    $html = $html -replace '<i[^>]*>(.*?)<\/i>', '*$1*'
    $html = $html -replace '<em[^>]*>(.*?)<\/em>', '*$1*'
    $html = $html -replace '<br\s*/?>', "`n"
    $html = $html -replace '</?p[^>]*>', "`n"
    $html = $html -replace '</?li[^>]*>', "`n- "
    $html = $html -replace '</?ul[^>]*>', "`n"
    $html = $html -replace '<a[^>]*href=["''](.*?)["''][^>]*>(.*?)<\/a>', '[$2]($1)'
    $html = $html -replace '<code[^>]*>(.*?)<\/code>', '`$1`'
    $html = $html -replace '<pre[^>]*>(.*?)<\/pre>', '```\n$1\n```'
    $html = $html -replace ' ', ' '
    $html = $html -replace '<', '<'
    $html = $html -replace '>', '>'
    $html = $html -replace '&', '&'

    # æ®‹ã‚Šã®ã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’é™¤å»
    $html -replace '<[^>]+>', ''
}

# Markdownå¤‰æ›
$markdown = Convert-HtmlToMarkdown -html $body

# ãƒˆãƒªãƒ ï¼†ä¿å­˜
$markdown = $markdown -replace "`r", '' -replace "`n{3,}", "`n`n"
Set-Content -Path $OutputMarkdownPath -Value $markdown.Trim() -Encoding UTF8

Write-Host "Markdownãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã—ãŸ: $OutputMarkdownPath"
```
